mapper.insert: insert into article(user_id, summary, title, records_id, clazz_id, update_time, create_time, is_private) value (#{userId},#{summary},#{title},#{recordsId},#{clazzId},#{updateTime},#{createTime},#{isPrivate});
mapper.select: select * from article where id = #{articleId} and is_private = 0
select * from article where user_id = #{userId} and is_private = 0
select a.* , c.name as clazz_name from article as a left join clazz as c on a.clazz_id = c.id where a.clazz_id = #{clazzId} and a.user_id = #{userId} and is_private = 0
select a.* , c.name as clazz_name from article as a left join clazz as c on a.clazz_id = c.id where title like "%"#{likeTitle}"%" and is_private = 0 limit #{from},#{size}
select user_id, count(id) as number, sum(visit) as visit, sum(`like`) as `like` from article where is_private = 0 group by user_id order by `like` desc
select a.*, c.name as clazz_name from article as a left join clazz c on a.clazz_id = c.id where is_private = 0 order by visit desc limit 0,15
